VLIB_homographyDecomposition

Detailed Description


Functions

int32_t VLIB_homographyDecomposition (VLIB_D64 H[3][3], VLIB_D64 rot[3][3], VLIB_D64 trans[3], VLIB_D64 proj[3])

Function Documentation

int32_t VLIB_homographyDecomposition ( VLIB_D64  H[3][3],
VLIB_D64  rot[3][3],
VLIB_D64  trans[3],
VLIB_D64  proj[3] 
)

Description:
This function uses Faugeras decomposition method to compute the projection vector, translation vector, and rotation matrix from a homography matrix.
Parameters:
[in] H[][] 3x3 H matrix
[out] rot[][] 3x3 rotation matrix
[out] trans[] 3x1 translation vector
[out] proj[] 3x1 projection vector
Implementation Notes:
  • This code is fully interruptible
  • This code is compatible with C66x float-point processors
